backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, conversations, messages, and call logs with access control and validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration with authentication gate and route definitions for all pages.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders chat messages with sender labels, timestamps, and support for video or text content.
frontend/src/components/chat/VideoMessag: Displays a video message with playback controls and rating UI using video rating hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout component providing navigation, header, and user menu based on identity state.
frontend/src/components/system/StateView: Provides reusable loading, error, and empty state UI components with optional actions.
frontend/src/components/video/StarRating: Interactive star rating component supporting half-stars, hover effects, and read‑only mode.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoRecor: Camera-based video recorder handling camera activation, recording, errors, and file output.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoTrimm: Video trimming tool allowing start/end selection, previewing, and exporting or sending the result.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoUploa: Validates and uploads local video files with size/type checks and user feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddConversation.ts: Mutation hook to add a conversation via the backend actor and refresh conversation data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallHistory.ts: Fetches call history from the backend actor with periodic polling and actor-aware loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversations.ts: Loads user conversations by ID from the backend and maps them into UI-friendly structures.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the currently authenticated user's profile using react-query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteCallEntry.ts: Provides a mutation to delete a call log entry with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state via DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileMutations.t: Defines mutations for creating and updating user profiles with backend validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRemoveConversation: Offers a mutation to remove a conversation and refresh conversation queries with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useSendMessage.ts: Handles sending messages to a conversation and invalidating related message and conversation queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Manages theme presets and user-specific theme preferences, applying colors to CSS variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useThreadMessages.ts: Fetches and maps messages for a conversation with periodic polling using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches a public user profile by principal and maps backend data into a UI-friendly structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSearch.ts: Performs user search queries and maps backend results, though principals are not returned.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoRating.ts: Provides mock video rating data and a mutation to set ratings with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including custom accent colors and global base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ActiveCallPage.tsx: Implements an active call UI with simulated connection state, video placeholders, call duration tracking, and mute/video controls.
frontend/src/pages/CallsPage.tsx: Displays recent call history with type icons, timestamps, deletion options, and navigation to start new calls.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Lists user conversations with avatars, last message previews, timestamps, and deletion and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ChatThreadPage.tsx: Shows a chat thread with message loading, auto‑scroll behavior, sending messages, and participant info resolution.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides a searchable user directory enabling starting chats or calls and creating new conversation IDs.
Form page for creating a user profile with username and display name, validating inputs and submitting via createProfile.
frontend/src/pages/IncomingCallPage.tsx: Displays an incoming call UI with caller info and buttons to accept or decline, navigating accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page allowing users to update profile fields and theme preferences, with form state synced to current user data.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: Shows another user's profile with options to start a chat or call, loading data via useUserProfile.
frontend/src/pages/VideoStudioPage.tsx: Video creation workspace with tabs for recording, uploading, and editing videos, storing the selected video file.
frontend/src/utils/conversationMeta.ts: Utility functions for creating, parsing, and validating conversation IDs derived from principals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state record defining app features, known issues, and versioning for a communications app with messaging, calling, video tools, and theming.
